channel.title: Compile don't like me
channel.description:
Ok on Testscape wth compile, when i try to use it i get this.
'Javac' is not recognized as an internal or exteranl command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue . . .
So i got suggest by someone to follow the compile error TUT, so i did. When i was done, i tried compile again, Got same message, and the server wouldnt run -.-' so i took of all the things and changed everything back befor i followed the tut. Compile said same thing, but at least the server worked again.
Anyone know whats wrong, or don't it just want to work for me?
[b]FIXED!!!![/b]

item.title: Compile don't like me
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_n00b Ooo Java
item.description:
@0wn3d_n00b wrote:

this is what ur compile and runserver should look like.
compile should be this…

@echo off
title YOUR SERVER NAME HERE
"C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe" -cp . *.java
"C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injava.exe" server
pause

and run server should be this

@echo off
title YOUR SERVER NAME HERE
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

copy and paste this into your compile and runserver. hope this helped don’t forget the rep (if it helped)

Read full topic
